author: Cedric Canard
content:
Actually, I recently read an article that suggested the porn industry has hit hard times; or perhaps I should say difficult times. Apparently sex doesn't sell as well as it used to. The irony is that it was the first industry to understand the business benefits of the Internet. But now the entire industry is struggling. There's probably a lesson in there somewhere ðŸ™‚

Nice photo by the way Andreas.
